1097900754105495553.text: I've been writing a thing about @urbit.  Here's the first part, about ownership and the overall network layout.https://medium.com/digital-stimulation/about-urbit-part-1-ownership-1a352973a409 …

1122903180554199040.text: What’s in a ~name? We wrote this to help explain how urbit’s naming workshttps://medium.com/@urbitlive/an-intro-to-urbit-names-e54b06ec984b …

1121915713470574592.text: The insanity of allowing the Walmart of the internet to have a microphone in your house... enjoy happy hour.

1121475460075069442.text: "Basically everything from the ground-up is re-written and re-thought in Urbit, with the goal of creating the perfect computing stack." - @mattgcondon Hot Takes: In which I try to explain Urbit https://bit.ly/2ErQW1c  #

1121207947235872768.text: We love @Urbit because it's for everyone. An agnostic #opensource infrastructure company securing individual rights and freedoms and protecting us from #megacorps.

1121065508353134592.text: "As long as there’s some intermediary standing between you and your data, that intermediary will always have an incentive to interfere in subtle ways that maximize their profitability." - What's Wrong with Social Media by @famousj https://bit.ly/2NGbiru  #urbit #selfsovereignty

1120705637481054209.text: The internet today is living in multiple apartment buildings owned by  #megacorp's who set all the rules. @urbit is creating a world where ~everyone~ can have a house. What do you choose? @Barry_Blaha #selfsovereignty #urbit

1115326987231465473.text: Any tech product which derives most of its value from convenience is a vulnerability. #megacorps

1115308158279462913.text: Urbit will free us from the invisible prison built by the #megacorps

1114181649183297536.text: What if you woke up in the morning, opened one application and everything you wanted to see was there in one place? @urbit #personalserver #selfsovereignty

1113954401868062720.text: Gmail, Facebook, Twitter, iCloud, Slack, Instagram, Dropbox, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Reddit, Outlook, Netflix, Airbnb, Nest, etc. Too many logins, no #privacy, no data ownership, everything silo'd, nothing communicates, can't take it w you. #urbit #megacorps

1113502675205640192.text: Social networking is a lie. There are only synthetic networks created out of massive databases holding most of the world's data. That means a huge attack surface and a dangerous dataset for AI. @urbit personal servers increase our security, enhance privacy and ensure freedom.

1112761545761718272.text: Buried inside every average internet user is a prolific creator of information. But barely any of us know that because we never see that information and we don’t even know what it is, where it’s stored, or how it’s used. #urbit #megacorps

1112523220991672320.text: Me bugging out trying to figure out what exactly tf @urbit is @0xa59a2d pic.twitter.com/UD34o1n3oQ

1108934718181928960.text: This presentation will one day be given in universities, if Cities don’t replace them.https://twitter.com/urbit/status/1108848803111530497 …

1108704551933300736.text: One of these sentences is true and one is not. #urbit #megacorpshttps://twitter.com/Apple/status/1108522091404386304 …

1108556524895563776.text: We are #urbit frontiersman charting the unmapped territories of the future digital worldhttps://twitter.com/snuggie_dancer/status/1108510569647259649 …

1108087497169485824.text: Our network explorer makes it easy to peep the accounts that own each star and galaxy. Lots of movement out there in hackerland https://twitter.com/John_C_Burnham/status/1108070086168981505 …

1107458956677578752.text: Just dropped, hot off the press: @galenwolfepauly laying it down for ya with the latest on #urbit.http://j.mp/2TTjOZL

1106596317000880128.text: And keep in mind that you can always use http://urbit.live  /<any valid urbit ship name or Azimuth point> to load the ship’s page directly. Tilde and hyphen are optional

1106594656429629441.text: "A real solution would mean rethinking computers, networks, and online identity, and then rebuilding things from the ground up. The good news is this actually exists. It’s called Urbit." - @famousj https://bit.ly/2IOkeMT  #urbit

1106593519731425281.text: We’ve been shipping code all week at the hacker hovel. With our all-new network explorer, enter any urbit planet name or Azimuth point number to view info about that ship. Or search a partial name to see all planets that match. Much more to come!pic.twitter.com/9kabREnWEs

1106219685589078017.text: The original vision of the internet was that it would be a global P2P network where we would all have our own server storing all of our data. We would share that data with whoever we chose to be networked with. This never happened and #megacorps aren't complaining. #urbit

1105971942526513153.text: The brevity of Max’s code is rivaled only by that of his Github comments! Great work by everyone at @urbit who has spent time on this since we discovered it https://twitter.com/urbit/status/1105969214337105921 …

1105901086324416513.text: You produce it, it has value, why should some #megacorp own it? #urbit

1105260364348907520.text: Imagine in five years hundreds of your IoT devices producing data. Clothing, watches, cars, cups, thermostats, etc. Every device's ~data is silo'd and owned by some different #megacorps? Or we send it all to an @urbit personal server that we own and control. #urbit

1104813011674546183.text: Thanks @stevesingh we’re here to build tools and services that help explore the next frontier in computing and digital experience. #urbithttps://twitter.com/stevesingh/status/1104808113763483653 …

1104438897453486080.text: Rise and shine, frontiersman. How many different apps and services will you have to use today to access the data you want to see? How much would one login and one data feed be worth to you? #urbit #buidl

1104059593817239552.text: Friday is off to a great start at the http://urbit.live  hacker hovel. We just deployed a giant update to planet name searches that reduces average request roundtrips from 14 seconds to well under 1 second. Give it a try. Can’t wait for the Austin @urbit meetup tonight!

1102753624784945158.text: We’re nothing if not vigilant :) Ping us when you hit rough seas. Extra points if you’re booting on a weird machine. We all know you have like five old raspberry pi’s in that desk drawer. Give it a gohttps://twitter.com/Stethers/status/1102416363400949761 …

1102619714893672448.text: http://urbit.live  is now spawning planets from ten Urbit stars, shown below. This means we have 65,535 x 10 or 655,350 planet names to choose from. Check back in for your favorite search terms like "master," "wishes," "dapper," or "wisdem"pic.twitter.com/RPVHB2FMvB

1101668204521377792.text: Let's see what goes down at tonight's AMA with @urbit CEO @galenwolfepauly at 8 pm PST. Livestream available at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ndk2b69fA9A&feature=youtu.be …

1100894882552516608.text: We now have over 500,000 planets listed on http://urbit.live ! If you're new, tap the button at the bottom to load a random set of available names. Or enter a search for something specific! Today's best finds: ~riddul-tartex, ~botnet-dorbyt, ~harnes-rocpen, ~tortus-torryx

1100563676371869696.text: We’ll be there. I’ll buy a whiskey for the first ten people to ;join ~livpub/austin-meetuphttps://twitter.com/urbit/status/1100531420844515328 …

1100120255823790082.text: "OK, now I'm doing it with four stars. This is so much better than flying cars."

1100118956709433345.text: Overheard today at the http://urbit.live  office: “I’m self-sovereignly messaging back and forth between two stars that I control and it’s amazing”

1100067328388149249.text: Thanks Marcus. ~bitbyt-haczod is my top find from the weekend and still up for grabs. ~mastus-rapper not bad, either, but someone copped yesterday. Happy hunting.https://twitter.com/marcusdorsen/status/1100060187958759429 …

1098332561405820930.text: We offer full support for every ship purchased. Give us a shout if you’re shipwreckedhttps://twitter.com/TheCryptoBox/status/1098053979051884549 …

1097643519773212673.text: We’ve been fielding quite a few questions about how this all works, so we’ve just added this to http://urbit.live . Reach out to us if you’d like more info. DM’s are openpic.twitter.com/m8XZ2jANks

1096696809819422720.text:
Folks, you heard it here first: this IS NOT an official urbit account :)

We just can’t seem to stop ourselves from searching for possible planet names. It’s like panning for gold. Some fav’s: ~datfyr-rapper, ~molten-matter, ~bicryp-tobfun, and..... ~midnyt-possum
